title: He was Happy on that Day, from "The Amman Project"
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [D. Heyman 2006]
description: line drawing-style portrait of a man with a heavy face, thin hair and a large dark moustache; text around man?s head, on shoulder and at bottom
